message: You're not being very generous, Alice!
Meet me in the middle, Bob!
You're getting desperate, Alice, I'll give you a better deal this time!
You're not getting it all, Bob!
You're getting close to losing everything, Alice, don't make me go to 0!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me at 60-40!
You're not even trying to negotiate, Alice, I'll take what I can get now!
Last chance, Bob! I'm not going down to 25%!
You're really not serious about negotiating, Alice, I'm taking control now!
